lead_paragraph: Forwards Marcus and Markieff Morris have withdrawn their commitments to Memphis a second and probably a final time. Marcus Morris confirmed to the Scout.com recruiting analyst Dave Telep that he and his brother, each considered a top-100 prospect, would not attend Memphis next fall.
